title: 求pe地图安装方法
author: Dick13938236156
txt_content: 求pe地图安装方法，肿么安装啊啊啊（android的）

replies.author: pogox
replies.txt_content: 把解压好的地图文件夹放到：sd卡/games/com.mojang/minecraftWorlds/里，进入游戏即可打开

replies.author: leo890817
replies.txt_content: (iOS適用）cydia下載iFile>minecraft PE應用資料夾＞documents>com.mojang>minecraftworlds>把資料夾貼上

replies.author: Dick13938236156
replies.txt_content:
pogox 发表于 2013-7-18 19:07 
把解压好的地图文件夹放到：sd卡/games/com.mojang/minecraftWorlds/里，进入游戏即可打开
为啥我用不了
